named-query.name: Score.findByGame
named-query.query: SELECT sc FROM Game ga JOIN ga.scores sc WHERE ga.id = :gameId ORDER BY sc.home DESC

named-query.name: Game.findTimelineDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.TimelineDto( cl.name, te.ordinalNbr, sc.home, SUM(q1.pts), SUM(q2.pts), SUM(q3.pts), SUM(q4.pts) ) FROM Score sc JOIN sc.roster ro JOIN ro.team te JOIN te.club cl LEFT JOIN sc.playerStats ps LEFT JOIN ps.stats q1 LEFT JOIN ps.stats q2 LEFT JOIN ps.stats q3 LEFT JOIN ps.stats q4 WHERE (q1.period = 1 OR q1.period IS NULL) AND (q2.period = 2 OR q2.period IS NULL) AND (q3.period = 3 OR q3.period IS NULL) AND (q4.period = 4 OR q4.period IS NULL) AND sc.game.id = :gameId GROUP BY sc.home ORDER BY sc.home DESC

named-query.name: GameLog.findIndividualBoxScoreDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.BoxScoreDto( gl.playerId, gl.seasonStartYear, gl.lastName, gl.firstName, gl.incognito, gl.jerseyNbr, gl.hasPlayed, gl.starter, gl.threePointersMade, gl.freeThrowsMade, gl.freeThrowsAttempted, gl.personalFouls, gl.points ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.gameId = :gameId AND gl.home = :home GROUP BY gl.playerId ORDER BY gl.starter DESC, gl.jerseyNbr

named-query.name: GameLog.findTotalBoxScoreDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.BoxScoreDto( SUM(gl.threePointersMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsAttempted), SUM(gl.personalFouls), SUM(gl.points) ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.gameId = :gameId AND gl.home = :home GROUP BY gl.home
